org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.processview
Class AeBpelObjectContainer

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.processview.AeBpelObjectBase
      org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.processview.AeBpelObjectContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBpelActivityObject, AeBpelCompensationHandlerObject, AeBpelEventHandlersObject, AeBpelFaultHandlersObject, AeBpelTerminationHandlerObject
public class AeBpelObjectContainer
extends AeBpelObjectBase

Composite pattern container representing a BPEL definition element which may have children. For example, the Process, Sequence, While contain other activities.
